lead_paragraph: -- The Democratic National Convention is to meet at Baltimore on the first Monday In June, 1852. People are already beginning to talk about the probable candidates. -- A sale of valuable copyrights and stereotype plates occurred on Friday at the Trade in Philadelphia.
abstract: Favours Internal Improvements by Fed Govt.
